english.segment1: Ignoring, A loss of sight, Afraid, To bleed, Come night, Lose the sun.
english.segment2: But don't, Make this out, To be more, Than it is, I'm behind, Every lie, There's a bird song within, YES YOU'RE MY SIGHT!!!
english.segment3: The suffering, That's kept within, Dispose of the men, Lost, Inside, He was negative.
english.segment4: This place, Once more was underground.
english.segment5: So look, And connect, We're refusing to rust, Healing has to begin, In the past.
english.segment6: So don't fake this, Don't fake this, Don't fake this, Don't!
english.segment7: The suffering, That's kept within, Dispose of the men, Lost, Don't fake this, Don't fake this, Don't fake this, Don't!!!. FAKE!!!. FAKE!!!
english.segment8: The suffering, That's kept within, Dispose of the men, Lost, So don't fake this, Don't fake this, Don't fake this, Don't!!!. FAKE!!!. FAKE!!!
